alert.note: Alert for Fannin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:20PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gilmer, northeastern Murray and northwestern Fannin Counties through 145 PM EST... At 119 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Conasauga Lake, or 9 miles northeast of Chatsworth, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chatsworth, Blue Ridge, Eton, Crandall, Conasauga Lake, Mineral Bluff, Jones Mill, Cherry Log, Higdon, Colwell, Cohutta Wilderness and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia.
